name: Arbitrove
intro: Yield-bearing index and strategy vault protocol
introduce: Arbitrove is a yield-bearing index for community members to get exposure to Arbitrum ecosystem assets (including but not limited to blue-chip DeFi protocols, emerging protocols, NFT, Arbitrum yield-farming assets). Arbitrove aims at creating alpha returns compared to the $ARBI token or major large cap Arbitrum tokens while limiting volatility and concentration risk.
